mapper.insert:
select member_seq.nextval from dual
insert into member(mem_no,mem_name,mem_id,mem_pwd,mem_email, mem_birth,mem_phone,mem_zipcode,mem_addr,mem_detailAddr,mem_gender) values(#{mem_no},#{mem_name},#{mem_id},#{mem_pwd},#{mem_email}, #{mem_birth},#{mem_phone},#{mem_zipcode},#{mem_addr},#{mem_detailAddr},#{mem_gender})
